QuestData.Title: Prowler Problems
QuestData.Description: The animals have all gone crazy!$b$bNormally the prowlers steer clear of the village, but now we can't seem to keep them away. I've never seen them act this way before!$b$bThe mayor has summoned in the Shado-Pan, but they're not all here yet. Can you take care of those prowlers before they maul one of our farmers?
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy 10 Sha-Infested Prowlers in Honeydew Glade.
